description: Gets the full details of a previously created session, including the session status and configuration.

nested_items.name: SessionId
nested_items.description: The session ID.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The session description.

nested_items.name: WorkGroup
nested_items.description: The workgroup to which the session belongs.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: The engine version used by the session (for example, PySpark engine version 3). You can get a list of engine versions by calling  ListEngineVersions.

nested_items.name: EngineConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains engine configuration information like DPU usage.

nested_items.name: CoordinatorDpuSize
nested_items.description: The number of DPUs to use for the coordinator. A coordinator is a special executor that orchestrates processing work and manages other executors in a notebook session. The default is 1.

nested_items.name: MaxConcurrentDpus
nested_items.description: The maximum number of DPUs that can run concurrently.

nested_items.name: DefaultExecutorDpuSize
nested_items.description: The default number of DPUs to use for executors. An executor is the smallest unit of compute that a notebook session can request from Athena. The default is 1.

nested_items.name: AdditionalConfigs
nested_items.description: Contains additional notebook engine MAP<string, string> parameter mappings in the form of key-value pairs. To specify an Athena notebook that the Jupyter server will download and serve, specify a value for the  StartSessionRequest$NotebookVersion field, and then add a key named NotebookId to AdditionalConfigs that has the value of the Athena notebook ID.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SparkProperties
nested_items.description: Specifies custom jar files and Spark properties for use cases like cluster encryption, table formats, and general Spark tuning.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: NotebookVersion
nested_items.description: The notebook version.

nested_items.name: SessionConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains the workgroup configuration information used by the session.

nested_items.name: ExecutionRole
nested_items.description: The ARN of the execution role used to access user resources for Spark sessions and Identity Center enabled workgroups. This property applies only to Spark enabled workgroups and Identity Center enabled workgroups.

nested_items.name: WorkingDirectory
nested_items.description: The Amazon S3 location that stores information for the notebook.

nested_items.name: IdleTimeoutSeconds
nested_items.description: The idle timeout in seconds for the session.

nested_items.name: EncryptionConfiguration
nested_items.description: If query and calculation results are encrypted in Amazon S3, indicates the encryption option used (for example, SSE_KMS or CSE_KMS) and key information.

nested_items.name: EncryptionOption
nested_items.description: Indicates whether Amazon S3 server-side encryption with Amazon S3-managed keys ( SSE_S3), server-side encryption with KMS-managed keys ( SSE_KMS), or client-side encryption with KMS-managed keys ( CSE_KMS) is used.

nested_items.name: KmsKey
nested_items.description: For SSE_KMS and CSE_KMS, this is the KMS key ARN or ID.

nested_items.name: StartDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the session started.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedDateTime
nested_items.description: The most recent date and time that the session was modified.

nested_items.name: EndDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the session ended.

nested_items.name: IdleSinceDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time starting at which the session became idle. Can be empty if the session is not currently idle.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the session. A description of each state follows.

nested_items.name: StateChangeReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the session state change (for example, canceled because the session was terminated).

nested_items.name: Statistics
nested_items.description: Contains the DPU execution time.

nested_items.name: DpuExecutionInMillis
nested_items.description: The data processing unit execution time for a session in milliseconds.
